meta.description: Nov. 26, 2002. WASHINGTON (Reuters Health) - Attorneys for the Bush Administration asked a federal court on Monday to order that documents on hundreds of cases of autism allegedly caused by childhood vaccines be kept from the public.
meta.keywords: www.educate-yourself.org, educate-yourself.org, ken adachi, franklin roosevelt, pearl harbor betrayal, roosevelt's treason, dwayne whitloik

title: US Gov't Asks Court to Seal Vaccine Records
